sections.title: File Requirements
content: To add a molecule to the database, a valid structured data file (.sdf) that contains the molecule information must be uploaded.
Structured molecule files can be obtained from {*Ref:Molinstincts}.
The file must contain the molecule information in the correct format and must end with a .sdf extension.
Large files may take longer to upload and process.

sections.title: Naming Requirements
sections.content: A name must be provided and the name of the molecule must not contain any spaces. If the name contain spaces, the molecule will not be added to the database.
